title.slogan: Delivering Industrial Digitalization with Cybernetics Expertise

items.title: Hi!
content: Digel is a newly founded company consisting of passionate engineers with backgrounds from cybernetics and robotics, and industrial IT.

Our consultants offer a broad range of expertise within automation systems, Operational Technology (OT) and Information Technology (IT). We are equipped to help you handle most problems ranging from embedded software development, designing and instrumentation of control and automation systems, as well as cloud/backend solutions, frontend development, and managing large amounts of timeseries data.

items.title: Project Experience
content: Our team brings experience from a wide range of industries, including Oil & Gas, Maritime Operations, Aquaculture, Construction, Carbon Capture, Batteries, Shipyards, Electronics, Semiconductors, Agriculture, Wastewater Treatment, Fertilizer Production, and Seaweed Farming. This diverse industrial background empowers us to deliver innovative solutions across various sectors, leveraging our expertise to drive excellence and make a meaningful impact.

items.name: Christoffer Lange
items.description: Manager driving effective digital transformations through industry insight and software expertise.

items.name: Victor Iversen
items.description: Automation and edge computing guru, making industrial systems efficient.

items.name: Thomas Andersen
items.description: Embedded systems and cloud specialist, known for lightning-fast development.

items.name: Axel Bech
items.description: Data engineer specializing in industrial applications.

items.name: Erlend Blomseth
items.description: Software Engineer skilled in architecture and problem-solving

items.name: Bj√∏rn-Erik Dale
items.description: Technology savvy business professional; co-founder, investor, and board member in Norwegian tech companies.

posts.title: Celebrating Innovation: The Launch of Digel

sections.content: We are thrilled to announce the launch of Digel, a forward-thinking company driven by a passionate team of engineers with extensive backgrounds in cybernetics, robotics, and industrial IT. At Digel, innovation isn't just a buzzword; it's the cornerstone of everything we do.

sections.title: Who We Are
sections.content: Digel is made up of a diverse team of engineers who bring a wealth of expertise and enthusiasm to the table. Our founders and team members have profound experience in the fields of cybernetics and robotics, two areas that are pivotal in the modern technological landscape. This expertise is complemented by a robust understanding of industrial IT, allowing us to create solutions that are not only innovative but also integral to the industries we serve.
